name: 東方漢方薬
summary:
Touhou Herbal Medicine (東方漢方薬 Touhou Kanpouyaku) is a music album by Conagusuri released on 2007-12-31 (Comiket 73). It is a vocal and instrumental album featuring arranges from Story of Eastern Wonderland, Embodiment of Scarlet Devil, Perfect Cherry Blossom, Imperishable Night and Mountain of Faith.
Track 9 is a remix of IOSYS' Marisa Stole the Precious Thing.
